message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product.  I think it would be perfect for your needs.  Given its value, I'm offering it to you for $20,000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the price of $20,000. I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product. Would you be able to accommodate this offer?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product. Could you meet me halfway at $16,000?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I still cannot meet the price of $16,000. My maximum budget remains at $12,000. Would you consider meeting me at this price?
